Course_Name: TKN Seminar Selected Areas of Telecommunication Networks 2024s

Messages.Author: Marie-Christin Hannah Oczko
Messages.Content: Hi everyone, please remember to upload your initial talk slides until Sunday 23:59. Best Regards, Marie P.S.: Also remember the exam registration deadline in MOSES is also on Monday!

Messages.Author: Marie-Christin Hannah Oczko
Messages.Content: Hi everyone, if you want to participate in the Seminar, please remember the Exam Registration Deadline: April 29, 2024 (Moses MTS). No exceptions possible. Best Regards and see you soon! Marie

Messages.Author: Marie-Christin Hannah Oczko
Messages.Content: Hi everyone, the topics are assigned now. Everyone got their first choice this time :-) See you later today! Best Regards, Marie

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Welcome to the master seminar @ TKN

Messages.Author: Falko Dressler
Messages.Content: Dear students, it's time for a new semester. On Monday, we start our master seminar on Selected Areas of Telecommunication Networks. We will meet at 16:15 in the seminar room HFT-TA 340. The first meeting will mainly be about seminar organization and topic assignment.  I am looking forward to meeting you on Monday! Falko Dressler

Messages.Author: Christian Kilian Stubbe
Messages.Content: Hi Marie, I heard from one more student dropping the course. You mentioned there might be other students participating that did not show up to the lecture yet.  Therefore my question – will the course definitely take place and will the lecture this afternoon take place?  Thank you for your reply!   Best,  Christian

Messages.Author: Marie-Christin Hannah Oczko
Messages.Content: Hi Christian,  I am sorry to hear that. Please still come to lecture today, we are still hoping another person might show up, then the seminar will take place. However, if not, we will have to cancel the course for this semester as vital parts of the portfolio exam cannot be executed. So, unfortunately, I cannot give you a final answer to your question until today afternoon. So sorry!  Best, Marie  P.S. If you decide not to come, please write me another short message here. Then we will definitely cancel the course.

Messages.Author: Christian Kilian Stubbe
Messages.Content: Hi Marie,  thank your for the reply. Has there been another submission? If not, I assume no one else will show up.  Maybe you can set in the future the deadline for signup in Moses before the first assignment is due? That way students still have the chance to get into another seminar – which I do not have anymore now.  Best, Christian

Messages.Author: Marie-Christin Hannah Oczko
Messages.Content: Hi Christian,  no, there is no other submission. That is a good idea, I will talk to Prof. Dressler about that. Sorry again. You could try again in the winter, usually there are at least about 8 people during that semester, and most topics usually stay the same. Then you could reuse your previous work from this semester.  Best, Marie

Messages.Author: Christian Kilian Stubbe
Messages.Content: Thank you. Then I will not come to the lecture today as I luckily found another lecture that is at the same time and that I can still sign up for.  Best, Christian
